Name: PTAssembler
Notes: Exposure fusion with TuFuse or enfuse. Automatic detection of image stacks.

Name: PTgui / PTgui Pro
Notes: Exposure fusion with enfuse or TuFuse. *) Pro version only.

Name: hugin
Notes: Exposure fusion with enfuse, automatic detection of image stacks.

Name: Image Composite Editor
Notes: Supports 16-bit camera raw input via WIC plugins

Name: AIPR Lite 1
Notes: (*) color mapping around the seams allows to preserve the original photometric properties of the images

Name: PanoEdit
Notes: EXR and 32 bit TIF are supported for export
